title: Spending, tax cut combo with biggest AD impact

content.prompt: Which of the following will result in the greatest increase in aggregate demand?

choices.label: A $100 increase in government expenditures, coupled with a $100 increase in taxes
A $100 increase in government expenditures, coupled with a $100 decrease in taxes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
